rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 8 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:45 PM, 28 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bulacan, Nueva Ecija, Laguna, Cavite, Batangas, Pampanga, Tarlac, Zambales and Bataan within the next 3 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Rizal(Antipolo, Cainta, Taytay), Metro Manila(Pasig, Mandaluyong, Makati, Manila) and Quezon(Panukulan, Burdeos, Polillo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
